#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,i;

	long long n,k;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin >> n >> k;
		
		long long sum = (k*(k+1))/2;
		
		if(n> sum)
		{
			cout << "-1" << endl;
		}
		else if(n == sum)
		{
			cout << "0" << endl;
		}
		else
		{
			sum -= n;
			sum = sqrt(8*sum+1) - 1;
			
			cout << sum/2 << endl;
			  
		}
		
	}
	
	return 0;

}
